INFO.IMPORTATION_SUCCEED:
Import successfully completed!
Offline mode is now available.
INFO.OFFLINE_OR_UNAUTHORIZED: No network connection, or unauthorized access.
INFO.UPDATE_OFFLINE_MODE_HELP: Before updating, please synchronize any completed trips.

ERROR.NOT_COMPATIBLE_PEER:
The application works in offline mode, because the node use a too old version.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator, or select a node v{{version}} or superior.

ERROR.SPACE_NOT_ALLOW: Spaces or special characters not allowed
ERROR.UNKNOWN_TECHNICAL_ERROR:
Technical error.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.UNKNOWN_NETWORK_ERROR:
Error communicating with the server.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.BAD_UPDATE_DATE:
Unable to save.
Concurrent change detected. Please reload this page and retry.
ERROR.DATA_LOCKED:
Unable to save.
Data locked on server. Please retry later
ERROR.LOAD_ACCOUNT_ERROR:
Error loading user account.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.SAVE_ACCOUNT_ERROR:
Error saving your account.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.ACCOUNT_NOT_EXISTS:
Your account does not appear to exist and can not be backed up.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.SENT_ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_FAILED:
Error sending account confirmation email.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.CONFIRM_ACCOUNT_EMAIL_FAILED: Error while confirming the email. This account may have already been confirmed?
ERROR.AUTH_SERVER_ERROR: Error during authentication on the server
ERROR.AUTH_CHALLENGE_ERROR: Error during authentication on the server (loading challenge failed)
ERROR.TABLE_READ_ONLY: Table is in read only mode
ERROR.SAVE_DATA_ERROR:
Error while saving data.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.LOAD_DATA_ERROR:
Error while loading data.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.NETWORK_REQUIRED:
No network connection.
Check your network connection before trying again.
ERROR.THIS_ACTION IMPORT_NEED_ONLINE_NETWORK: No network connection. Unable to synchronize.
ERROR.IMPORT_REFERENTIAL_ERROR: Error while loading referential lists. Could not enable the offline mode.
ERROR.DATA_MIGRATION_FAILED:
Failed to migrate data.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.BAD_APP_VERSION: Please update the app. Retrieving and sending data with the current version may not work.
ERROR.LOAD_TRASH_ENTITY_ERROR: Error while loading the trash file
ERROR.DELETE_TRASH_ENTITY_ERROR: Error while deleting the trash file
ERROR.ENTITY_STORAGE_MIGRATION_FAILED: Failed to migrate the local database
ERROR.DELETE_ENTITY_ERROR:
Error while deleting.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.SUBSCRIBE_ENTITY_ERROR: Error while subscribing to remte changes
ERROR.TERMINATE_ENTITY_ERROR:
Cannot terminate entry.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.SYNCHRONIZE_ENTITY_ERROR:
Cannot synchronize.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
ERROR.SYNCHRONIZE_CHILD_BEFORE_PARENT_ERROR:
Error when synchronize, setting has to be synchronize before hauling.
If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.
